Module kivakit.service.registry
Package com.telenav.kivakit.service.registry

Interface ServiceRegistry

All Superinterfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Broadcaster, com.telenav.kivakit.component.Component, com.telenav.kivakit.component.ComponentMixin, com.telenav.kivakit.core.vm.JavaTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.language.trait.LanguageTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Listener, com.telenav.kivakit.mixins.Mixin, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject, com.telenav.kivakit.resource.PackageTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.project.ProjectTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.registry.RegistryTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Repeater, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.RepeaterMixin, com.telenav.kivakit.core.function.ResultTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.settings.SettingsTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.language.trait.SilentTryTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter, com.telenav.kivakit.core.language.trait.TryTrait
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseServiceRegistry, LocalServiceRegistry, NetworkServiceRegistry
public interface ServiceRegistry extends com.telenav.kivakit.component.ComponentMixin
Not public API

For details on what service registries are and how they work, refer to ServiceRegistryClient. The client is a REST + JSON proxy to LocalServiceRegistry and NetworkServiceRegistry processes which provides a public API to the key methods in this class. Further details on service registry implementation are also available in BaseServiceRegistry.

Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
See Also:
BaseServiceRegistry, LocalServiceRegistry, Service, ServiceType, Application.Identifier, Port, Result

      Adds or updates registration information and renews the lease for the given service.

    • discoverPortService

      @NotNull @NotNull com.telenav.kivakit.core.function.Result<Service> discoverPortService​(com.telenav.kivakit.network.core.Port port)
      Returns:
      Any service running on the given port. Since a Port includes the host it is unique and only a single service is returned since only one service can be running on a specific port on a specific host.

      default boolean isLocal()

    • isNetwork

      default boolean isNetwork()
      Returns:
      True if this is a NetworkServiceRegistry

    • register

      @NotNull default @NotNull com.telenav.kivakit.core.function.Result<Service> register​(Service service)
      Registers a Service, returning a Service object that has been bound to a unique physical port (on a specific host) and which has a lease on that port for a few minutes. The resulting new registration information will be immediately passed on to the NetworkServiceRegistry.

      This method is only implemented by LocalServiceRegistry since the NetworkServiceRegistry is updated through information propagated from local registries.

      Parameters:
      service - The service to register
      Returns:
      The registered service, bound to a port

    • renew

      @NotNull default @NotNull com.telenav.kivakit.core.function.Result<Service> renew​(Service service)
      Renews the lease on a service that has been registered with register(Service) on the local host. The resulting renewal information will be passed on to the NetworkServiceRegistry.

      This method is only implemented by LocalServiceRegistry since the NetworkServiceRegistry is updated through information propagated from local registries.

    • settings

      default ServiceRegistrySettings settings()
